entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning early in the morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
